channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLscienceAndDiscovery
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLscienceAndDiscovery, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Scientists discover crystal that breathes oxygen like lungs
item.description: Researchers developed a crystal that inhales and exhales oxygen like lungs. It stays stable under real-world conditions and can be reused many times, ...

item.title: Hidden venom divide in Australia’s deadliest snake raises urgent treatment questions
item.description: Scientists have uncovered a startling split in the venom of Australia’s Eastern Brown Snake. In the south, bites cause rock-solid blood clots, while i...

item.title: Ancient fossil discovery in Ethiopia rewrites human origins

item.title: A safe painkiller? New research raises concerns about Tylenol’s safety in pregnancy
item.description: A large-scale review finds that acetaminophen use during pregnancy may increase the risk of autism and ADHD in children. The strongest studies showed ...

item.title: 140,000-year-old skeleton shows earliest interbreeding between humans and Neanderthals
